arts.ttl: 'I never had that feeling before' Tim Walter's delight as Hull City score Stoke success
arts.sum: "Especially in the first half, it changed after the (Stoke) goal we were better in the game, so we were more prepared to play forward, we were more courageous and that's important. I'm happy about the performance from my boys because they always believe that they can win the games, and that's important.

arts.ttl: ‘Charity FC strike again’ - Steven Schumacher referenced as Stoke City hand Hull first win - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: It was the first game in the dugout for new Potters’ head coach Narcis Pelach after Monday’s sacking of Steven Schumacher, but any hopes of a winning start to his tenure vanished after half-time. We looked knackered just before half time and never looked in the game after the break.

arts.ttl: Hull comeback seals first win of season to stun Pelach on Stoke bow
arts.sum: Hull came from behind to earn their first victory of the season with a 3-1 win over Stoke at the bet365 Stadium.

arts.ttl: Stoke City player ratings vs Hull as Narcis Pelach sees second-half collapse
arts.sum: Everything seemed to be going right for Pelach in the first 45 minutes as Stoke went ahead thanks to a firm Ben Wilmot header and might have had two more, with good chances for Bae Junho and Million Manhoef. Viktor Johansson saved Kasey Palmer’s penalty but Palmer headed in the rebound, Regan Slater put the visitors in front when Stoke had tried to play out from the back and Palmer put salt tin the wounds when his pass into the six-yard box was turned in by the keeper.

arts.ttl: Stunning second half comeback sees Hull City seal landmark victory at Stoke City
arts.sum: A much improved second half display saw City level it up when Mohamed Belloumi was tripped by Eric Bocat inside the box, and after seeing his penalty well saved by Viktor Johansson, Kasey Palmer nodded in the rebound just after the hour. Boss Walter made three changes to his side from the defeat to Sheffield United a week ago,- with Cody Drameh, Oscar Zambrano and Kasey Palmer coming in to start, with Ryan Giles, Fin Burns and Abu Kamara all dropping to the bench where they were joined for the first time by goalkeeper Carl Rushworth and Steven Alzate.

arts.ttl: Hull hit back against Stoke to claim first win of season
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach was beaten in his first game as Stoke boss.

arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Hull live news, action and reaction as Narcis Pelach takes reins
arts.sum: Stoke host Hull City at the bet365 Stadium in the Championship (8pm) with Pelach having been officially appointed on Wednesday to replace Steven Schumacher. Narcis Pelach takes charge of his first match as head coach to cap a dramatic week at Stoke City.

arts.ttl: Claim made over Tim Walter’s position at Hull City ahead of Stoke City tie
arts.sum: Hull City boss Tim Walter is already under pressure at the MKM Stadium, a report from Football Insider… The post Claim made over Tim Walter’s position at Hull City ahead of Stoke City tie appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Hull City transfer latest as ex-Fenerbahce striker update emerges
arts.sum: Hull City have agreed a deal in principle to sign forward Joao Pedro after his release by Fenerbahce last month, as the Tigers move to beef up their attacking ranks. City have added an option into his deal which could see that extended into a second year if the move works out for both parties, with the one-time Italian international getting his first taste of English football with the Tigers.

arts.ttl: Hull City reach agreement to sign free agent striker, reporter claims
arts.sum: Hull City have reached a ‘full agreement’ to sign attacker Joao Pedro, according to journalist Yagiz Sabuncuoglu on… The post Hull City reach agreement to sign free agent striker, reporter claims appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
